nodes.text: Norokai was a veteran of the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry who joined the company prior to its campaign on the planet Vir Aphshire. Following that battle in 0 ABY, the rebel Private Hazram Namir compared Norokai to a newly recruited clansman of the Malkhanis, a ruthless army from Namir's homeworld of Crucival. In Namir's opinion, both Norokai and the Malkhanis held faith in their commanders despite claiming cynicism.
Norokai was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
